evidence: I stayed past midnight twice this week prepping for the dashboard launch. The VP pulled the timeline forward by two weeks and everyone's scrambling.

conv-001.summary: Morning check-in covering running progress (8K), yoga and knee recovery, work-life balance improvements (leaving by 6pm), Spain trip planning with Jamie, proposal idea for Barcelona, family updates (Mom visit overdue, Maya's birthday tomorrow), and Duolingo streak at 142 days.

conv-002.summary: Evening wind-down covering 10K run success (no knee pain), Maya's birthday gift received well, work stress escalation (stayed past midnight twice for dashboard prep), Jamie's birthday dinner plans, Mom's upcoming surgery, engagement ring browsing, and Spanish progress at 148-day Duolingo streak.

claims: Making real progress on work-life balance — leaving office by six daily
Stayed past midnight twice this week for dashboard launch prep
review-001.title: Work-life balance contradiction
review-001.summary: On Feb 2, Alex reported making real progress on work-life balance and leaving the office by 6pm daily. Six days later on Feb 8, Alex stayed past midnight twice for dashboard prep. These statements directly contradict each other.
